channel.title: Hugo on Tom Utley
channel.description: Recent content in Hugo on Tom Utley

item.title: My First Post
item.author: tom@tomutley.com (Tom Utley)
item.description: So, this is Hugo I decided to try my hand at the new and exciting world of static site generation using the golang-based Hugo. This is it, the skeleton for my new site. Hopefully I’ll add some stuff here in the future that is exciting and interesting.
